Name: id
Description: An identifier variable that uniquely identifies each response

Name: submission_date
Description: Timestamp that determines when the data was received

Name: business_dist
Description: District of residence of the business

Name: business_type
Description: Type of business

Name: business_yrs_in_operation
Description: How long business has been in operation for?

Name: stop_business
Description: Did you have to stop your business due to COVID-19 pandemic?

Name: how_lng_stop_business
Description: For how long did you have to stop your business due to COVID-19 pandemic?

Name: business_effect_by_reduced_vol_business
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent observed "reduced volume of business"

Name: business_effect_by_increased_covid_cases
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent observed "increased COVID-19 cases in their area"

Name: business_effect_by_emplys_covid_situation
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent observed "their employees were affected by COVID-19"

Name: business_effect_by_human_resources_shortage
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent observed "shortage of human resources"

Name: business_effect_by_supply_chain_disruption
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent observed "supply chain disruption"

Name: business_effect_by_lack_sevices_access
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent observed "lack of access to services due to government-imposed lockdown"

Name: business_effect_by_lack_mobility
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent observed "lack of mobility due to government-imposed lockdown"

Name: business_effect_by_patners_disagrmnt
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent observed "disagreement with partners/fallout"

Name: business_effect_by_lack_fin_resources
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent observed " lack of adequate financial resources"

Name: business_effect_by_other
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent observed " any other impacts " due to COVID-19 pandemic.

Name: business_no_effect
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent didn't observed any affect in their business operations

Name: most_significant_effect_business
Description: We also asked businesses to rank order their choices for the above multi-select question. This column captures what each respondent chose as their first option.

Name: wrkfrc_actn_reduced_temporary_workers
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "had to reduced the number of temporary workers"

Name: wrkfrc_actn_reduced_permanent_workers
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "had to reduced the number of permanent workers"

Name: wrkfrc_actn_reduced_working_hours
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "had to reduce the working hours"

Name: wrkfrc_actn_introduced_rotational_employment
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "had to introduce rotational employment"

Name: wrkfrc_actn_asked_workers_paid_leave
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "had to ask workers to take paid leave"

Name: wrkfrc_actn_asked_workers_unpaid_leave
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "had to ask workers to take unpaid leave"

Name: wrkfrc_actn_asked_workers_reduced_pay
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "had to ask workers to work for reduced pay"

Name: wrkfrc_actn_decreased_employee_benefits
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "had to decrease or remove employee benefits (like perks, bonus, etc.)"

Name: wrkfrc_actn_other
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "had to take other workforce related actions beside given options"

Name: no_wrkfrc_actn
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "didn't had to take any workforce-related actions"

Name: loan_impact_took_loan_easily
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "took loan(s) quite easily to continue their business"

Name: loan_impact_couldnt_take_loan
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "tried but could not take loans"

Name: loan_impact_took_loan_difficultly
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "took loans but faced significant difficulties in taking loans"

Name: loan_impact_difficult_paying_existing_loan
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "faced difficulty in paying back existing loans"

Name: loan_impact_other
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "faced any other loan related impacts"

Name: no_loan_impact
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "faced none of the provided loan related impacts"

Name: asset_impact_sold_assets
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "sold some of their assets (e.g. vehicles, equipment, buildings, land)"

Name: asset_impact_couldnt_sell_assets
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "could not find buyers when wanted to sell their assets"

Name: asset_impact_rented_assets
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "rented out some of their assets"

Name: asset_impact_other
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "faced any other assets related impacts"

Name: no_asset_impact
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "faced none of the provided assets related impacts"

Name: cost_impact_couldnt_cover_operating_cost
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "could not cover their operating costs (e.g. rent, electricity, etc.)"

Name: cost_impact_cancelled_investment_plans
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "canceled or postponed their investment plans"

Name: cost_impact_made_visit_nepal_investments
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "had made significant investments specifically targeting Visit Nepal 2020"

Name: cost_impact_other
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "faced any other cost related impacts"

Name: no_cost_impact
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "faced none of the provided costs related impacts"

Name: location_impact_moved_business
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "moved their business/office to a different location"

Name: location_impact_closed_branches
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "closed down some of their offices/branches"

Name: location_impact_tried_couldnt_move_business
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "tried to move their business/office but couldn't move"

Name: location_impact_other
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent " faced any other location related impacts"

Name: no_location_impact
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent " faced none of the provided location related impacts"

Name: eqty_ownrshp_impact_sold_entire_business
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "sold their entire business"

Name: eqty_ownrshp_impact_tried_couldnt_sell_business
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "tried to sell their entire business but could not find buyers"

Name: eqty_ownrshp_impact_sold_some_business_equity
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "sold some equity (ownership) of their business"

Name: eqty_ownrshp_impact_tried_couldnt_sell_some_equity
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent "tried to sell some of their equity but could not find buyers"

Name: eqty_ownrshp_impact_other
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent " faced any other equity and ownership related impacts"

Name: no_eqty_ownrshp_impact
Description: Flag variable that indicates whether the respondent faced "none of the provided equity and ownership related impacts"

Name: fin_effect_other
Description: Flag variable that indicates if the respondent faced "any other financial impacts"

Name: n_employes_pre_covid
Description: How many people did your business employ before the pandemic?

Name: wrkfrc_size_chng_2020_v_2019
Description: Compared to 2019, how has the size of your workforce changed in 2020 (During the pandemic)?

Name: revenue_chng_2020_v_2019
Description: Compared to 2019, how have your business revenues changed in 2020 (During the pandemic)?

Name: savings_chng_2020_v_2019
Description: Compared to 2019, how has your business's savings changed in 2020 (During the pandemic)?
